subject: [Lab 08] Q12: Linked Lists as Strings
content:
Q12: Linked Lists as Strings

Please post all questions you have below concerning Q12: Linked Lists as Strings in the follow-ups.

If you are stuck on this question, feel free to read through the follow-up responses to see if you can draw any ideas from them.

threads.question: Do we need to consider when the link.first is a Link type ?
